RTCOutboundRtpStreamStatsRemoteId.summary:
The remoteId property of the
dictionary specifies the
of the
object representing the remote peer's which is sending
the media to the local peer for this SSRC.
RTCOutboundRtpStreamStatsRemoteId.value:
A string containing the ID of the
object that represents the remote peer's
for the synchronization source represented by this stats
object.
